questions: Can you provide a brief overview of your experience in the Information Technology industry?
What specific roles or positions have you held during your 7.7 years of experience?
How have you stayed current with advancements and trends in the IT industry?
Can you discuss a particularly challenging project you worked on and how you successfully overcame obstacles?
How do you approach problem-solving and troubleshooting in IT-related scenarios?
Have you had experience working with cross-functional teams or departments? If so, can you provide an example?
What technical skills or certifications do you possess that you believe set you apart in the IT field?
How do you prioritize and manage multiple projects or tasks simultaneously?
Can you discuss a time when you had to quickly adapt to new technology or software in your role?
How do you see yourself contributing to the growth and success of a new team or company in the IT industry?
